rules.allow: read: if isSignedIn(); write: if isUser(userId);
read, list: if isUser(userId); create, delete: if isUser(userId);
read: if isSignedIn() && (resource.data.from == request.auth.uid || resource.data.to == request.auth.uid);
delete: if isSignedIn() && (resource.data.from == request.auth.uid || resource.data.to == request.auth.uid);
